description.p: Fires before any orphaned media files are deleted from the local file system on the device.

discussion.p: The *[ui:beforeDeleteOprhanMediaFiles]* event is triggered before any orphaned files on the device file system are removed. Orphaned media files are files that were previously downloaded but are no longer referenced by any record in a List.
If this event returns false, the orphaned files will not be deleted.

argument.name: e
argument.description: An object with the following properties:

property.name: array
property.description: An array containing the list of orphaned files that will be deleted.

see.ref: How To Download Files to a Mobile Device
